name: FindAnagrams
description:
The goal is to select, through the pieces of letters proposed more anagrams possible, plus an anagram will be long and the more your players will come to the finish line before your opponent (computer).
5 levels divided into 10 panels

SINGLE: Challenge control the time, through the 5 levels

DOUBLE: Challenge an opponent, with a chance to play in TWO ON THE SAME DEVICE.
The screen will be made in two parts and the players will have to get one facing the other. Will win the fastest.
Good fun!
==
MORE OF 260,000 ENGLISH WORDS
MORE OF 300,000 ITALIAN WORDS
==
